description: Welcome to “The Oaks”, this bright and stylish 3-level corner townhouse in one of the most desirable communities in Richmond! Offers 4 bedrooms and 4 baths, including 3 ensuites. This unit is on the back row of cambie road with beautiful natural light from the North and South. Open-concept kitchen with quartz countertops, BOSCH  appliances. Well-maintained living and dining areas with access to a balcony and a fenced backyard. Main floor includes a bedroom and a full bathroom. Two ensuite bedrooms upstairs plus an extra bedroom and 3-piece bath on the lower level. Quality finishes throughout with stylish cabinetry, wood flooring, and radiant-heated bathroom floors. Near transit, park, shops, supermarket, Aberdeen Center. Open house: Jan 4, Sun, 2:00-4:00pm
